caption.title: C:N vs. climate and temporal variables.
caption.p: C:N ratios as determined by weight %C and weight %N measured on a Costech Elemental Analyzer compared to a) time collected (year), b) δ 13C atm values (‰), c) δ 13C leaf values (‰). Error bars on the y-axis are associated with the 0.9% replicate reproducibility of standards. Error bars on the x-axis in c) are associated with the 0.3‰ replicate reproducibility of the Picarro CRDS standards.
Click here for additional data file.
